docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES Inflation and indebtedness are the twin curses of Latin America. Not the 6 percent inflation the United States lives with but, as in the case of Argentina, 160 percent inflation. Not worrisome yet man  ageable indebtedness to foreigners...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES Inflation and indebtedness are the twin curses of Latin America. Not the 6 percent inflation the United States lives with but, as in the case of Argentina, 160 percent inflation. Not worrisome yet man ageable indebtedness to foreigners but, as in the case of Peru, practically national bankruptcy.

docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Feb. 10 (AP) --A Uruguayan Air Force transport on a commercial flight with passengers and mail crashed during an emergency, landing today at the northern city of Artigas. All 31 persons aboard were killed, the air force announced.

docs.snippet: ASUNCION, Paraguay, Feb. 13--South America began a busy year of Presidential and legislative elections in one of its most forgotten corners as Paraguayans voted yesterday to determine the margin by which President Alfredo Stroessner, undisputed dean...
docs.lead_paragraph: ASUNCION, Paraguay, Feb. 13--South America began a busy year of Presidential and legislative elections in one of its most forgotten corners as Paraguayans voted yesterday to determine the margin by which President Alfredo Stroessner, undisputed dean of Latin American dictators, would be elected to his sixth term since 1954.
